Text.Page: <PCNAME> killed the Devan Assault Leader with Chama's help, and returned stolen supplies back to Crescentia. Jodoc thanked <PCNAME> for protecting the supply lines, but said there was still a bigger problem left to handle.

They're taking orders from the {@linkcreature:3#12#Devan Assault Leaders}.You see them patroling with the worms?

Once we take care of one, the rest should scatter. We've tried to locate the command post, but there are just too many devas patrolling the area."Is there any way I can help?"

Yes...I think so!

We'll attack on two fronts. You take out the {@linkcreature:3#300151#devas} in the front, and while they're distracted, I'll slip past their lines and get a precise fix on a leader.

Good work, . While you kept them busy, I slipped through their defenses and found their command post.

It's well-guarded, and loaded with stolen supplies.

Let's work our way there, and take out some of these devas on the way. Be sure to grab the money they're carrying; I'm sure the townspeople would love to have it back."Got it. I'll see you soon."

Okay, here's the plan.

You check the command post, and I'll do what I can to keep the devans off your back.

When you've finished grab some stolen supplies from the chests scattered around here, then meet me on the far side of the valley.

Great work, !

We've got it from here. You should take those supplies on to Crescentia. The townspeople will be grateful for their return.

Oh, and do what you can to clear out some of those Sporewalkers between here and town."I'm on it."

Wow! So the leader is finally dead? And you were able to recover our stolen goods?

I...I don't know how to thank you, ! But on behalf of the people of Crescentia, allow me to present you with this token of our appreciation!
